original_title: Night of the Living Dead: The Puppet Show - Better Than Live?
overview: Yet another damn remake of George Romero's 1968 classic, Night of the Living Dead: The Puppet Show, captures the horror, suspense and psychological tension of the original film, but re-imagined as a zany 30-minute funhouse ride.
tagline: This is what happens when people stop being alive and start being flesh- eating ZOMBIES!
title: Night of the Living Dead: The Puppet Show - Better Than Live?
